import React from 'react' import styled from 'styled-components' import Fade from 'react-reveal/Fade'; export default function Section(props){ return(

{props.title}

{props.tagline}

 {props.leftBtn} {props.rightBtn && {props.rightBtn} } {props.arrow && }
) } const Main = styled.section` background-image: url(${props => props.bg}); ` const ModelName = styled.div`` const Buttons = styled.div`` const LeftBtn = styled.button`` const RightBtn = styled(LeftBtn)`` const Arrow = styled.div` i { animation: bounce infinite 2s; } ` const CTA = styled.div``
